# Problem 1 

Load packages (below) & installed _penguins_ dataset (not shown)

```{r library, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r load_penguins}

data("penguins", package = "palmerpenguins")
```

The _penguins_ dataset contains geographic and demographic data on individuals belonging to different species of penguins. There are `r nrow(penguins)` individual penguins and `r ncol(penguins)` variables: species, island, bill_length_mm, bill_depth_mm, flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, sex, and year.
